message: Let's make a deal! I propose I take $60 and you get $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, with me getting the bigger share since I'm the one making the proposal this round.  Let's get this done!
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 in your favor isn't fair. How about 55/45?  The clock is ticking!
We're getting close to the end, and this is my final offer.  Take it or leave it, but I'm not going lower.  Time is money!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now. Don't be greedy! We both lose if this goes on much longer.
